name: Distill, My Beating Heart! (Playdate)
description:
Go from novice to master distiller on the Playdate!
Gather resources!

Distill sips!

Watch out for bugs!

Buy! Sell! Upgrade! And through it all? Discover the love of the art of distilling.

You also unlock a High Score Mode after your first play through.

Made for the PIGSquad Finish Your Game Jam in November 2022.

There are a few minor updates to this game I would like to make eventually, but it pretty much functions as intended. Have fun!
